<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Antaro Boldblade](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2470)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 8

**Perception** +4

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +6, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +0

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36), [Wooden Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=2), [Splint Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 (17 with Shield Raised)

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +2 

**Will** +8 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 9

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rapier +5 ([deadly 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 16
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

</column>
name: Antaro Boldblade
primary_source: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace
